long_description: Use the Mountain House Chicken Fajita wraps as a tasty filling for your own tortillas. Just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided; let stand for 8 - 9 min., and serve in tortillas or over rice or pasta (all not included). 18g of protein per serving provides 36% of the recommended daily value. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Use the Mountain House Chicken Fajita wraps as a tasty filling for your own tortillas.
